name: keila
description: Keila is an open source email marketing and newsletter tool. It enables list management, campaign design and sending, and basic analytics, providing a self hosted alternative for small organizations that want control over subscriber data.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Create and send newsletters with visual template editor. Send professional emails to subscribers

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Organize subscribers into lists with import and export tools. Manage your audience effectively

features.title: Template Editor
features.description: Design email templates with drag-and-drop or HTML editing. Create beautiful newsletters easily

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track open rates, click-through rates, and campaign performance. Measure email marketing success

features.title: Unsubscribe Management
features.description: Automatic unsubscribe handling and preference centers. Respect subscriber choices
